<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script is to increase the max length of the column "table" in sm_schedule. </description>
        <name>Increase max length of sm_schedule.table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[
			 updateColumnMaxLength("table", 120);
function updateColumnMaxLength(columnName, maxLength) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	gr.addActiveQuery();
    gr.addQuery("name", "sm_schedule");
	// If max_length is less than 80, then allow to update the field.
	gr.addQuery("max_length", "<" , maxLength);
    gr.addQuery("element", columnName);
    gr.query();

    if(gr.next()) {
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.setValue("max_length", maxLength);
		gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
